aboutFlennor.title: A little about Flennor parts
aboutFlennor.firstAbout: Founded in 1935, Flennor has a rich heritage rooted in the heart of Germany in Düsseldorf. Initially established to meet the burgeoning needs of the automotive industry, we have grown into a brand synonymous with quality and reliability in automotive spare parts. Our commitment to excellence has propelled us to expand our reach globally, ensuring we bring top-tier products to our international clientele.
aboutFlennor.secondAbout: Flennor operates with a strategic global footprint, ensuring our expert services and high-quality products are available worldwide. Our regional sales offices are strategically located to facilitate efficient and reliable service:

list.firstList: Düsseldorf, Germany: Our headquarters remains a hub of innovation and leadership in quality automotive parts.
list.secondList: Dubai, United Arab Emirates: Positioned at the crossroads of trade, our Dubai office expands our reach into the thriving Middle Eastern markets.
list.thirdList: Istanbul, Turkey: Serving as the gateway between Europe and Asia, our Istanbul office strengthens our ability to meet the demands of these critical regions.

map.title: Have you noticed our spread?
map.subTitle: We exist all over the world
